scripts.backend:sync: sh -c 'if command -v uv >/dev/null; then uv sync --project backend; else python3 -m pip install -r backend/requirements.txt; fi'
scripts.backend:dev: sh -c 'if command -v uv >/dev/null; then uv run --project backend uvicorn server:app --reload --app-dir backend; else python3 -m uvicorn server:app --reload --app-dir backend; fi'
